name: Visual Novel Maker - Horror SE Perfect Collection
detailed_description:
Sinister, demented, and full of fear, this new pack has 42 Back Ground Songs and over 377 Sound Effects perfect for horror, zombies, or dark / noire themed games. Items breaking and being destroyed, explosions, firearms, knife attacks, unfortunate bodily mishaps, many back ground common and highly usable sounds that will add that extra dimension of reality to your game!

All BGS and SE come in .ogg and .m4a format

short_description: Sinister, demented, and full of fear, this new pack has 42 Back Ground Songs and over 377 Sound Effects perfect for horror, zombies, or dark / noire themed games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Visual Novel Maker - Horror SE Perfect Collection

subs.option_text: Visual Novel Maker - Horror SE Perfect Collection - 24,99€
